name: Drifloon
description: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
abilities.description: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon uses or loses its held item, its Speed is doubled.  If it gains another item or leaves battle, this bonus is lost.  This includes when the Pokémon drops its item because of knock off.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  There is no notification when this ability takes effect.
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.effect: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack when burned.
abilities.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.
